short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension to add links to specific locations on a web page with features including search, add, edit and delete.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to AnchorPages! 

AnchorPages lets you save links to text fragments on a page to come back to the exact location later. 

Here is how it works:
- Simply highlight a piece of text
- Right click on the highlight and click "Save this as anchor"

That's it. Enjoy!
You can also save this link along with a title by using a form in this extension.
